title: Fast action / sports shutter
q: best shutter for sports freeze motion football basketball
a: Use 1/1000s as a safe starting point (1/2000s for very fast plays). Shoot Shutter Priority, Auto ISO, continuous AF (AI‑Servo/AF‑C).

title: Portrait lighting basics
q: portrait lighting soft light window reflector 45 degrees rembrandt
a: Place a soft light 45° to the subject and slightly above eyes. Use a reflector to fill. Aim f/2–f/4 and ~1/125s; raise ISO before dropping shutter.

title: Golden hour tip
q: golden hour best time outdoor photos color temperature warm
a: Golden hour = first hour after sunrise, last hour before sunset. White balance 5200–6000K for natural look; lower for warmer vibes.

title: Windows high CPU
q: windows high cpu usage fix task manager background apps startup
a: Ctrl+Shift+Esc → sort by CPU. Disable heavy startup apps: Settings → Apps → Startup. Update drivers & Windows; scan for malware; Balanced power plan.

title: Linux disk space
q: linux check disk usage which folders big du df clean apt
a: Run: sudo du -h --max-depth=1 / | sort -hr | head. Quick overview: df -h. Clean caches: sudo apt autoremove && sudo apt clean.

title: Exposure triangle
a: Aperture controls depth, shutter controls motion, ISO adds brightness/noise. For sharp portraits in low light: f/2–f/2.8, 1/125s, Auto ISO.
